project_top_description: I was boring so i decided to do a little work based on the differents models founded on Unsplash
project_main_text:
I wanted ton created a landing page presenting the differents models

This summer, Candia release a new product, Candy’up Bio, and they need to present this product on their website.

Like for the others candia’s products, they present them on on a single page. This page include all the differents nutrition’s informations and at the same time communicate about the benefits of this drink.
